abstract: The brand’s sales and reputation have held up, analysts say, because Lexus has not been included in Toyota’s most serious recalls.
snippet: The brand’s sales and reputation have held up, analysts say, because Lexus has not been included in Toyota’s most serious recalls.
lead_paragraph: It has been a rough few months for Toyota because of its three big safety recalls. But the automaker’s luxury division, Lexus, appears to have avoided much of the fallout.

headline.main: Lexus, a Toyota Brand, Avoids Taint From Recalls
headline.print_headline: Lexus, a Toyota Brand, Avoids Taint From Recalls

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: LEXUS DIVISION OF TOYOTA MOTOR SALES USA

abstract: Robert Lutz, a General Motors vice chairman, said it was too early for his company to convert many people who have been driving Japanese cars.
snippet: Robert Lutz, a General Motors vice chairman, said it was too early for his company to convert many people who have been driving Japanese cars.
lead_paragraph: WARREN, Mich. — Robert A. Lutz, a General Motors vice chairman, spent much of his nine years at the company trying to persuade people that its vehicles were just as good as Toyota’s.

headline.main: Toyota’s Ills Won’t Help G.M.’s Sales, Lutz Says
headline.print_headline: Toyota’s Ills Won’t Help G.M.’s Sales, Lutz Says
